attributes.action: Stop Government Interference in the Education Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The development of the Education service should be put into the hands of a dedicated team of education professionals with the addition of a top business brain. For too long we have had too many Education Ministers making changes that clearly, over many years and many governments have not produced a satisfactory environment or a satifactory product from our schools.
